constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 215 (Tuesday, December 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McCLINTOCK:
H.R. 6276.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 7 of the Constitution of the
United States of America.
[Page H7824]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3045 Sacramento Street in Placerville, California, as the "Deputy Sheriff Brian Ishmael Post Office".
